TopicTitle: 1.2.2 update - Missing conics in Training, crashes on updated install

Articles.Content:
Mods installed are/were:

  • Kerbal Alarm Clock 3.7.1.0
  • Kerbal Engineer 1.1.2.8
  • Trajectories 1.6.5

In reverse order:

  1. Steam automatic update from 1.2.1 to 1.2.2 resulted in hangs that required rebooting my Windows box (Windows 10), corrupted a save file, and required uninstalling then reinstalling from Steam to get a reliable executable. The log file shows no issues that I can detect - I can send it to whoever is appropriate if desired.
  2. Training and scenario games in 1.2.2 lack patched conics - this makes the Asteroid, Impact, and frankly any rendezvous situation unplayable. This was not the case in 1.2.1.

Just as heads up, I don't think there's a good answer to these issues....
